text: Allahane tumacyasi khupa jasta yud'dhata jinkalelya malaca vayada kela ahe, jo tumhi prapta karala ani he tara tumhala tvarita pradana kele, ani lokance hata tumacyapasuna rokhale, yasathi ki imana rakhanaryankarita hi eka nisani tharavi, ani yasathi ki tyane tumhala sarala margavara calavave
